title: By Day, Cortina D’Ampezzo Is an Olympic Hub. By Night, It’s a Party.
summary_full: Cortina d’Ampezzo, a small Alpine town in northern Italy, is hosting much of the Winter Games. It’s also a home away from home for rich partygoers.
summary_public: Cortina d’Ampezzo, a small Alpine town in northern Italy, is hosting much of the Winter Games. It’s also a home away from home for rich partygoers.
